Alavanca - Class in game
Represents a lever puzzle with a fixed number of levers, each associated with a specific effect.
Alavanca() - Constructor for class game.Alavanca
Creates a new lever puzzle with exactly one lever of each type: The effects are then shuffled so that the mapping between lever number and effect is random for each new instance.
AlavancaEnum - Enum Class in enums
Enum the possivels efects of an trigger in a division
